header.title: Madasha Ka Qaybgalka Bulshada
header.subtitle: Khadkaaga tooska ah ee Xafiiska Duqa Magaalada ZOHRAN.

welcomeBanner.title: Codkaaga, Mustaqbalka Magaaladeena
welcomeBanner.description: Ku soo dhawoow madasha rasmiga ah ee ka qaybgalka dadka degan Magaalada New York. Si xor ah u soo sheeg arrimaha bulshada iyo magaalada oo dhan, la soco ajandayaasha, oo si toos ah ula xiriir xafiiska Duqa Magaalada Zohran.

welcomePage.agendaDescription: Eeg mudnaanta muhiimka ah ee xafiiska Duqa Magaalada uu hadda ka shaqeynayo, laga soo bilaabo kaabayaasha ilaa amniga dadweynaha. La soco heerka dadaallada firfircoon.
welcomePage.reportDescription: Miyaad aragtay arrin ka jirta bulshadaada? Soo geli sawir, sharax dhibaatada, oo si toos ah ugu gudbi waaxda magaalada ee ay khusayso.
welcomePage.chatDescription: Ku soo biir wadahadalka dadka kale ee deggan NYC si aad uga hadashaan mowduucyada bulshada oo aad ula wadaagtaan ra'yigiina.
welcomePage.newsletterDescription: Iska qor warsideheena toddobaadlaha ah si aad u hesho wararkii ugu dambeeyay ee ku saabsan ajandaha Duqa Magaalada iyo dhacdooyinka bulshada.
welcomePage.footer: Â© {year} Xafiiska Duqa Magaalada New York Zohran Kwame Mamdani. Xuquuqda oo dhan way xifdisan tahay.

agenda.title: Ajandayaasha Xafiiska Duqa
agenda.description: La soco horumarka dadaallada muhiimka ah ee magaalada oo dhan.
agenda.searchPlaceholder: Ka raadi ajandayaasha cinwaan ama sharaxaad...
agenda.noItems: Wax shay ah oo u dhigma raadintaada ma jiraan.

chat.initialMessage: Ku soo dhawoow Wadahadalka Bulshada! Kani waa meel ay dhammaan dadka degani kaga hadlaan mowduucyo muhiim ah. Fadlan ixtiraam dadka kale.

report.uploadDescription: Guji ama jiid oo soo rid sawir ama muuqaal gaaban (ugu badnaan 15s)
report.promptPlaceholder: Sharax arrinta (tusaale, 'Lulid jaban 0:05', 'Godka ku wareeji goobo')

feedback.prompt: Arrintan si lagu qanco ma loo xalliyay?

confirmation.title: Warbixinta si guul leh ayaa loo gudbiyay!
confirmation.description: Warbixintaada hadda waa la baaraandegayaa. Waxaad ka la socon kartaa heerkeeda "Warbixinnadayda la soo Gudbiyay".
confirmation.locationPinned: Goobta si guul leh ayaa loogu calaamadeeyay warbixinta.

error.videoTooLong: Muuqaalku aad buu u dheer yahay. Fadlan soo geli muuqaal ka yar 15 ilbiriqsi.
error.invalidFileType: Nooca faylka oo khaldan. Fadlan soo geli fayl sawir ama muuqaal ah.

login.loginToContinue: Gal si aad u sii wadato
login.joinCommunity: Ku soo biir bulshada si aad u bilowdo

error.unableToRetrieve: Lama soo ceshan karo goobtaada. Fadlan awood sii adeegyada goobta oo isku day mar kale.
error.nameRequired: Magaca warbixiyaha waa loo baahan yahay.
error.invalidLatLng: Fadlan geli loolka iyo dhulbarka nambar sax ah.
error.invalidLatRange: Loolku waa inuu u dhexeeyaa -90 iyo 90.
error.invalidLngRange: Dhulbarku waa inuu u dhexeeyaa -180 iyo 180.
